# withTimeZone | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Foundation ](/documentation/foundation)

-  withTimeZone 

Type Property# withTimeZone

iOS 10.0+iPadOS 10.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.12+tvOS 10.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 3.0+

```
static var withTimeZone: ISO8601DateFormatter.Options { get }
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/foundation/iso8601dateformatter/options/withtimezone#Discussion)

The date representation includes the timezone. The format for timezone is `ZZZZZ`.

## [See Also](/documentation/foundation/iso8601dateformatter/options/withtimezone#see-also)
